"ARKS Operative Test: White Summit":
"Oh, <%me>.
Thanks for stopping by. My request this time isn't
really a request at all. It's test of your ability as an
ARKS op. And the location of your test? You got it.
The White Summit on Naberius. But I imagine
completing "White Summit Survey" on Hard difficulty
in about 20 minutes wouldn't be a problem for you.
Show me that I'm not wrong about you.
*Complete the mission within 20 minutes
on Hard difficulty or above."
"アークスとしての力試し：凍土編"

"あっ、<%me>！
わざわざ来てくれたのね、ありがとう！
今回お願いしたい依頼……じゃないっ！
アンタの力試しの舞台は、ここ！
そう、惑星ナベリウスの凍土よ！
凍土地域状況調査の
ハードを２０分でクリアぐらい
アンタにとってはもうラクな課題でしょう？
その強さ、私に示してみせてよね！
※ハード以上、２０分以内クリア"
